actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A concurrent resolution entitled:  "The International Airspace Safety Resolution".

summary.text: Urges the President to take action to separate the Soviet Union from international aviation through an international agreement that provides that participants to such agreement will deny landing and overflight rights to Soviet commercial aircraft and to commercial aircraft of nations who continue to grant such rights to Soviet commercial aircraft. States that such sanctions will remain in effect until the Soviet Union compensates the families of those who died on board Korean Air Lines flight 7 and establishes policies to assure that such an attack never again occurs.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution entitled:  "The International Airspace Safety Resolution".
